About Quarto Notebook



This document was written as a Quarto notebook, which provides a rich authoring and publishing environment. Importantly, the notebook format allows the interleaving of prose commentary and code outputs (such as tables or plots) between blocks of code. It’s also easy to convert a notebook to a range of formats.
